Structs/MMMParallaxUpdateEvent.html#/hei.name: heightProgress
Structs/MMMParallaxUpdateEvent.html#/hei.abstract: The amount the view is resized; maxSize = 1.0 (e.g. 100% showing); minSize = 0.0; so half way is 0.5

Structs/MMMParallaxUpdateEvent.html#/new.name: newHeight
Structs/MMMParallaxUpdateEvent.html#/new.abstract: The new height of the parallax view.

Structs/MMMParallaxUpdateEvent.html#/top.name: topProgress
Structs/MMMParallaxUpdateEvent.html#/top.abstract: The position of the view in the containerView; 0 = top, 0.5 = half on screen, 1 = bottom.

Structs/MMMParallaxScrollEvent.html#/pro.name: progress
Structs/MMMParallaxScrollEvent.html#/pro.abstract: The position of the ParallaxView in the wrapper (0 = top, 0.5 = center, 1 = bottom)

Structs/MMMParallaxHeightEvent.html#/pro.name: progress
Structs/MMMParallaxHeightEvent.html#/pro.abstract: The amount the view is resized; maxSize = 1.0 (e.g. 100% showing); minSize = 0.0; so half way is 0.5

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/StickPosi.name: top
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/StickPosi.abstract: Only stick to the top of the container

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/StickPosi.name: bottom
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/StickPosi.abstract: Only stick to the bottom of the container

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/StickPosi.name: none
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/StickPosi.abstract: Don’t stick at all, the position or cell is just tracked

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/StickPosi.name: both
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/StickPosi.abstract: Stick to the bottom and top of the container

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/TrackingT.name: tableView(indexPath:)
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/TrackingT.abstract: Track a cell in a tableView, you’re scrollView should be a UITableView for this

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/Height.ht.name: fixed(min:max:)
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/Height.ht.abstract: Instructs to use fixed minimum and maximum heights known in advance.

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/Height.ht.name: dynamic
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/Height.ht.abstract: Instructs to use Auto Layout when determining the minimum and the maximum height of the view.

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/Height.ht.name: automatic(with:)
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions/Height.ht.abstract: Calculate the height of the view automatically by autoLayout, gets the minimum height by calculating using

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions.html#/hei.name: height
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions.html#/hei.abstract: Define the min and max height of your ParallaxView

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions.html#/typ.name: type
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions.html#/typ.abstract: Define the tracking type, could be either scrollView (define a y pos) or tableView (define a IndexPath)

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions.html#/for.name: forwardsTouches
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions.html#/for.abstract: If the view should forward touches to the scrollView, makes it possible to scroll when dragging on the views.

Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions.html#/sti.name: stickPosition
Structs/MMMParallaxViewOptions.html#/sti.abstract: The place on screen where the view will stick to (top, bottom), when using .none, the resizing functionality

Protocols/MMMParallaxView.html#/parallax.name: parallaxView
Protocols/MMMParallaxView.html#/parallax.abstract: The view whose position and size will be managed.

Protocols/MMMParallaxView.html.name: MMMParallaxView
Protocols/MMMParallaxView.html.abstract: A view that can be placed over a Scroll/TableView that follows a certain point or cell. The height can be resized on scroll,

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: scrollView
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: The scroll or table view to coordinate “parallax views” for.

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: containerView
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: The UIView to add the parallaxViews to, usually the parentView of your scrollView.

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: shouldAdjustContentInset
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: true if the receiver should adjust contentInset of the table or scroll view to compensate

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: heightConstraintPriority
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: The priority of the parallax view height constraint. By default .defaultHigh + 1 (751).

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: stretchTopViewWhenBouncing
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: Defines what happens when the user scrolls down past the scroll view’s content (“bounces”)

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: stretchBottomViewWhenBouncing
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: Same as stretchTopViewWhenBouncing but for the parallax view tracking the bottom of the content.

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: stickToSafeAreaInsets
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: true if safeAreaInsets of the container should be taken into account when sticking the parallax views.

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: parallaxViews
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: The “parallax views” that should be managed by the coordinator.

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: recalculate()
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: Call this method to recalculate the positions of the parallax views.

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: viewForRowAt(indexPath:)
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: Descriptor of a parallax view that is following a cell with the given index path, if any.

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: heightForRowAt(indexPath:)
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: The height of a proxy cell in your table view to match the maximum height of a parallax view

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: maxHeightForView(_:)
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: The height for a proxy cell in your table view or a proxy view in your scroll view to match the maximum

Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.name: hitTest(for:)
Classes/MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.html#.abstract: hitTest helper method, call super.hitTest and pass that view here. Override this in your viewController / container when

Classes/MMMParallaxViewDescriptor.html.name: MMMParallaxViewDescriptor
Classes/MMMParallaxViewDescriptor.html.abstract: Describes the view to be managed by MMMParallaxViewCoordinator.
